title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1339/95 of 13 June 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 3262/94 fixing, for the 1995 fishing year, the withdrawal and selling prices for fishery products listed in Annex I (A), (D) and (E) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1339/95 of 13 June 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 3262/94  fixing, for the 1995 fishing year, the withdrawal and selling prices for fishery products listed in  Annex I (A), (D) and (E) of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92 (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 3262/94 is amended as follows:
>TABLE>
2. Annex II to Regulation (EC) No 3262/94 is supplemented as follows:
>TABLE>
3. Annex III to Regulation (EC) No 3262/94 is amended and supplemented as follows:
>TABLE>
>TABLE>
4. Annex IV to Regulation (EC) No 3262/94 is amended and supplemented as follows:
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the  European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 June 1995.
For the Commission Emma BONINO Member of the Commission
